text: Well, I see what seems to be a mother or could be a babysitter with two children, a boy and a girl. The kids are after the cookies and the little boy is going to hurt himself really badly. And the mother is in not too good of shape either because there's water spilling out of the sink and her feet are going to get wet. She could slip, she could break the dishes, she could really hurt herself. The little girl, I don't think she's safe enough, though it looks like she's a little worried. It's a beautiful day. Windows are open. The curtains are... Well, it's not too windy because the curtain seems to be in place. Other than that, it seems a very sweet home. And... probably a little... a few years ago. right now.
